description:
The Ski Ties Co-Pilot Ski Harness is a device that helps beginners learn to ski faster and easier. It is different from other ski harnesses that attach to the upper body, as it connects to the boots of the skier and allows them to find their natural balance and stance.

  • You can control the speed and direction of the skier using the elastic reins that clip and unclip easily
  • The harness is bright, visible and comes with a name patch to prevent loss
  • It is suitable for children aged 3 to 6, and can be used for skiing or snowboarding
name: Ski Ties Co-Pilot Ski Harness - Children
